title: Futuristic Engine Sounds: Deeticopter Vol. 1
description: The package of deeticopter engines, designed in a futuristic style, including 168 high-quality sound effects, 8 kinds of deeticopters. Perfect for spacecrafts, spaceships, futuristic helicopters, drones and sci-fi vehicles with propellers.
longDescription:
Audio Preview: https://soundcloud.com/magic-sound-effects/sets/futuristic-engine-sounds-deeticopter

Sound List: https://www.dropbox.com/s/p8e8znj8a9xwcmz/MSE%20-%20Futuristic%20Engine%20Sounds%20-%20Deeticopter%20Vol.%201.pdf?dl=0


A deeticopter is a futuristic medium to large vehicle with propellers that can be used for civilian and military purposes.


The collection includes sounds for each vehicle:

  • 24 fast and 24 slow acceleration sounds
  • 24 fast and 24 slow deceleration sounds
  • 60 seamless loops of engine rpm sounds at five speeds - idle, low rpm, mid rpm, high and very high rpm
  • 96 transition sounds between speeds


A total of 12 futuristic vehicles in the set.


Each vehicle engine is a complex, massive and multi-layered sound that contains realistic samples of vehicles, helicopters, aircrafts and several layers of synthesis.Â 


Can be used to create many types of futuristic vehicles: spacecrafts, spaceships, futuristic helicopters and battleships, big quad copters and drones, flying cars and sci-fi vehicles and objects. Enjoy!


For support and other questions, please send an email to: magic.sound.effects@gmail.com.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • 252 game-ready sound effects
  • 44.1 khz, 16 bit, wav, stereo
  • 12 deeticopters in total
  • 5 types of engine rpm - idle, low, mid, high, very high
  • 60 seamless loops of engine rpm sounds in total
  • 48 acceleration sounds, 48 deceleration sounds
  • 96 transition sounds between engine rpm
  • perfect for the game genres of simulation, adventure, strategy and more


Number of Audio Waves: 252

Number of Audio Cues: 252

Sample rate / bit rate: 44.100 Hz / 16 Bit

Do Sound FX loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 34 minutes 24 seconds

Supported Development Platforms: All

  • Windows: Yes
  • Mac: Yes
